Linux ubuntu 4.15.0-139-generic #143~16.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Wed Mar 17 08:10:33 UTC 2021 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

aarch64-linux-gnu-gcc (Ubuntu/Linaro 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.9) 5.4.0 20160609

https://blog.csdn.net/nuc_baixu/article/details/106603323

# /etc/mosquitto/mosquitto.conf 为服务器配置文件
# -d ：指定服务于后台
mosquitto -c /etc/mosquitto/mosquitto.conf -d
